name: Race Cars (Basiccomputer)
description:
Get Ready for some Racing Fun!!!

Race Cars is a 2-player game where both players race around 4 different tracks to see how many laps a player can get before the 3 minute time expires.

CONTROLS

AWSD = Moves Red Car

Arrow Keys = Moves Blue Car

Escape = Exits Game

F1 = View Manual

F2 = Reset Game

F3 = Change Racetrack

F4 = Change Window Size
